Key Match Events: Justyn-Henry Malloy's eighth-inning sacrifice fly helped the Detroit Tigers rally from a 3-0 deficit to move closer to the postseason with a 4-3 win over the Tampa Bay Rays.
B. Lowe singled to right, Rortvedt scored and Walls scored in the 3rd inning.
Walls scored on Mize wild pitch in the 5th inning.
Keith tripled to right, Vierling scored in the 6th inning.
Carpenter singled to right, Keith scored in the 6th inning.
Keith singled to center, Greene scored, Vierling to third in the 8th inning.
Malloy hit sacrifice fly to center, Vierling scored, Keith to second in the 8th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Comerica Park with an attendance of 27,867.
The game lasted 2 hours and 23 minutes.
Umpires for the game were Brian O'Nora (Home Plate), Brennan Miller (First Base), Chris Conroy (Second Base), and Shane Livensparger (Third Base).
